ADAlertRule.name: AP Invoice
ADAlertRule.filterClause: (((ad_user_id is not null and ad_user_id=@#AD_USER_ID@) or (ad_user_id is null)) And ((ad_role_id is not null and ad_role_id=@#AD_ROLE_ID@) or (ad_role_id is null)))

ADAlertRule.name: AP Prepayment Invoice
ADAlertRule.filterClause: (((ad_user_id is not null and ad_user_id=@#AD_USER_ID@) or (ad_user_id is null)) And ((ad_role_id is not null and ad_role_id=@#AD_ROLE_ID@) or (ad_role_id is null)))

ADAlertRule.name: AP Prepayment Application
ADAlertRule.filterClause: (((ad_user_id is not null and ad_user_id=@#AD_USER_ID@) or (ad_user_id is null)) and status in ('NEW' ,'SOLVED') And ((ad_role_id is not null and ad_role_id=@#AD_ROLE_ID@) or (ad_role_id is null)))
